column3:
It's better to remove the connect line and leave the slot named like that.
Qt will automatically connect slots with a certain name, this is what
happens when you create handler methods from the designer interface as well.
I had a 50% chance of chosing the right fix :D ... will update! But that was a weird bug for me ^^.\n

Well they're both right fixes :-) But removing a line is simpler.

It was kind of weird to me too, the first time I encountered it. I wondered
how qt designer created the connections to the host object slots. It is
documented in QMetaObject::connectSlotsByName.
